pr_title: feat: Added support for data values in event import [DHIS2-9270]

timeline.message: feat: Added support for data values in event import [DHIS2-9270]

timeline.author: luciano-fiandesio
luciano-fiandesio

timeline.bodyText: minor: you can use Function:identity() instead of trackedEntityAttributeValue -> trackedEntityAttributeValue
timeline.author: luciano-fiandesio

timeline.bodyText: Shall we also set lastUpdated and created?
timeline.author: luciano-fiandesio

timeline.bodyText: I'm a bit puzzled regarding this code. The current tracker, as far as I know, does not handle file resources associated to Event Data Values. Can someone confirm @mortenoh @stian-sandvold
timeline.author: luciano-fiandesio

timeline.bodyText: I wonder if it would not be more efficient to handle the file resources assignment by first checking if the Data Value is linked to a Data Element of type FILE_RESOURCE
timeline.author: luciano-fiandesio

replies.bodyText: Absolutely, it got lost in the refactor
replies.author: enricocolasante

timeline.bodyText: Is this supposed to stay ignored?
timeline.author: stian-sandvold

replies.bodyText:
This test is failing and it is not executed by maven because the name of the class does not finish with 'Test'.
I put ignore just to not have problems when running all the tests from Intellij
replies.author: enricocolasante
